conclusion: Conclusion: The overall reaction from the audience was AVERAGE with an average of 3.60 stars. The feedback was moderately positive, suggesting room for improvement. Consider refining the content or presentation.

Daniel Kvyat is what they call 'a jinx' in American. A junx attracts bad luck, he seemingly without reason or cause, messes things up. Such people exist. Kvyat happens to be one of them. In 2020 he showed his jinx qualities for the last time and his F1 career was over. The only way for a jinx to get over it is to get into psychotherapy to find reasons why he is attracting bad luck and stupid manoevres. But such people are blind to themselves, they prefer to blame something else. It has to do with ethics and integrity, the most difficult things to face in life. A jinx will jinx that up, too.
